text: Gary Anthony Williams (born March 14, 1966) is an American actor and comedian. He is known for providing the voice of Uncle Ruckus in the Adult Swim series The Boondocks and is also the voice of Beta in the Disney Channel series Hailey's On It!. He also stars in Weeds and Boston Legal. Williams was born in Atlanta, Georgia. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Atlanta
title: Gary Anthony Williams
